directions.step:
Place ham on rack, fat side up in roasting pan. Insert meat thermometer, not by bone. Bake uncovered, 325 F, 18-20 mins per lb. 30 mins before ham is done, remove from oven. Score in a cross-cross fashion, 1/8" in and 1" apart. Glaze ham. Bake an additional 30 mins.
Delicious! TNT shared by Sherilyn Schamber, Sept. 1997
